intro: Stellaria cilicica, commonly known as the Cilicia starwort, is a flowering plant native to the region of Cilicia in Turkey. It belongs to the Caryophyllaceae family, which includes many species of flowering plants known for their showy flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or arid environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. Its small, star-shaped flowers are usually white or pale pink, adding a delicate touch to its natural habitat. Stellaria cilicica is often found in mountainous areas, where it thrives in well-drained soils and full sunlight.
